name: Uncalled Four
bio: Uncalled Four is one of the best interactive shows in the country, with fest attendees contributing, voting, and winning prizes. We also highlight the city we're in, soliciting local businesses for quirky and awesome prizes, trying to find the "weird" where you live. But above all that, it's the comics who love doing the show. Competition brings out the best in them. In short, it's a fun and dirty comedy game show where everyone wins.
copy: Half stand up, half game show, Uncalled Four is an interactive crowd experience. Comedians write a deck of 20 terrible/hilarious answers to audience questions like "What does Trump's hair smell like?" or "Dad went out to buy _____ and never came back." Comedians each submit a card while we give out a prize each round, then fan reaction determines the winner. After 30 minutes, comics can wager points in the final "Degenerate Gambler" round to see who will be The Worst Person.
